pr_title: MULE-18011: ArtifactClassLoaderRunner - Add support for testing mule-services artifacts

timeline.message: Support for FunctionalTestCases on Services with class loading isolation

timeline.author: elrodro83
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32,5 +32,11 @@
    * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} should be classified as module. The main code of the
    * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} is added to the CONTAINER {@link ClassLoader}.
    */
-  MODULE
+  MODULE,
+
+  /**
+   * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} should be classified as service. The main code of the
+   * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} is added to the PLUGIN {@link ClassLoader}.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/tests/runner/src/main/java/org/mule/test/runner/api/ArtifactClassificationType.java b/tests/runner/src/main/java/org/mule/test/runner/api/ArtifactClassificationType.java
index f053d311a3f..fbca57d1f74 100644
--- a/tests/runner/src/main/java/org/mule/test/runner/api/ArtifactClassificationType.java
+++ b/tests/runner/src/main/java/org/mule/test/runner/api/ArtifactClassificationType.java

@@ -36,7 +36,7 @@ public enum ArtifactClassificationType {
 
   /**
    * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} should be classified as service. The main code of the
-   * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} is added to the PLUGIN {@link ClassLoader}.
+   * {@link org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact} is added to the SERVICE {@link ClassLoader}.
    */
   SERVICE
 }
